intro: This Product User Manual (PUM) serves as a comprehensive guide for users of the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) High-Resolution Layer (HRL) Grasslands product. It outlines the characteristics, production methodologies, and quality assessments associated with the annual provision of HRL Grasslands data. The manual details product lineage, user requirements, application areas, product descriptions (including nomenclature, file naming conventions, and spatial resolution), quality assessment procedures, and access and usage conditions, providing essential information for effective utilisation of the HRL Grasslands product.
